title: Mirror Dash
description: Control two mirrored squares to dodge obstacles from both ends. Survive as long as possible in this minimalist endless reflex game.
fallbackImage: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='160' viewBox='0 0 300 160'><rect width='300' height='160' fill='%23000'/><rect x='60' y='130' width='30' height='30' fill='%23fff'/><rect x='210' y='0' width='30' height='30' fill='%23fff' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='60' y='0' width='180' height='10' fill='%23999'/><rect x='60' y='150' width='180' height='10' fill='%23999'/></svg>
